# BeerGargoyle Dart Client

Generated Dart client for the BeerGargoyle gRPC API.

## Installation

Add this to your `pubspec.yaml`:

```yaml
dependencies:
  beergargoyle_client:
    git:
      url: https://github.com/sdroscher/beergargoyle-dart-client.git
      ref: main  # or specific version tag like v1.0.0
```

## Usage

```dart
import 'package:beergargoyle_client/beergargoyle_client.dart';

// Your gRPC client code here
```

## Generated Files

This package contains auto-generated code from protobuf definitions. 
Do not edit the generated files directly - they will be overwritten.

## Version

This package is automatically updated when the API definitions change.
